text: aur jab usakee jaati ne usase vaad-jhagada kiya, to usane kahaah kya tum allaah ke vishay mein mujhase jhagad rahe ho, jabaki usane mujhe supath dikha diya hai tatha main usase nahin darata hoon, jise tum saajhee banaate ho. parantu mera paalanahaar kuchh chaahe (tabhee vah mujhe haani pahuncha sakata hai). mera paalanahaar pratyek vastu ko apane gyaan mein samoye hue hai. to kya tum shiksha nahin lete
